trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa áudio de entrada que é associado com um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor de fala gera informações sobre a entrada de áudio como parte da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o áudio reconhecido, use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>método de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Resultado de um reconhecimento pode ser produzido pelas seguintes eventos e métodos da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>classes:-eventos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>> [!IMPORTANT] > reconhecimento de um resultado produzido pelo reconhecimento de fala emulado não contêm áudio reconhecido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Para tal um resultado de reconhecimento, seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>propriedade retorna `null` e sua <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>método lançará uma exceção.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o reconhecimento de fala emulada, consulte o `EmulateRecognize` e `EmulateRecognizeAsync` métodos de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>classes.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local no fluxo de áudio de entrada para o início do áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade se refere a posição no início da frase reconhecida no fluxo de áudio gerado do dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, o `RecognizerAudioPosition` propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>classes fazem referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro de sua entrada de áudio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Essas posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando eventos de reconhecimento de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>propriedade obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: O local no fluxo de áudio de entrada para o início do áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a duração do fluxo de áudio de entrada de áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: A duração dentro do fluxo de áudio de entrada de áudio reconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de áudio processado por um mecanismo de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O formato de áudio processado pelo reconhecedor de fala.

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona e retorna uma seção do atual reconhecido áudio como dados binários.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de partida dos dados de áudio a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento do segmento a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma subseção do áudio reconhecido, conforme definido pelo audioPosition e duration .

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPositione duration definem um segmento de áudio fora do intervalo de segmento atual.

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Atual reconhecido áudio não contém dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade StartTime obtém a hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento, que pode ser útil para cálculos de latência e o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>propriedade obtém o local no fluxo de áudio gerado do dispositivo de entrada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A hora do sistema no início da operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: Grava o áudio inteiro em um fluxo como dados brutos.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: Dados de áudio são gravados `outputStream` em formato binário.

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma informação de cabeçalho está incluída.

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: O método WriteToAudioStream usa o formato de onda, mas não inclui o cabeçalho do Wave.

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para incluir o cabeçalho do Wave, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que receberá os dados de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: Gravações de áudio em um fluxo em formato de onda.

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: Dados de áudio são gravados `outputStream` no formato Wave, que inclui um cabeçalho de formato (RIFF) de arquivo de intercâmbio de recurso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>método usa o mesmo formato binário, mas não inclui o cabeçalho do Wave.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que receberá os dados de áudio.
